content:
That's a great idea! Offering a "Holiday Special" with a free jar of jam with the purchase of a gift basket is a wonderful way to drive sales and incentivize customers to buy. And I love the gift basket theme ideas you came up with! "Sweet Treats", "Gourmet Delights", and "Fruitful Harvest" are all great options that showcase your products in a beautiful and appealing way.

By the way, since you're planning to sell out your entire stock at the upcoming holiday market, I think it's a good idea to consider offering a "Limited Time Only" or "While Supplies Last" disclaimer on your promotional materials to create a sense of urgency and encourage customers to buy sooner rather than later.

What do you think?
